bucket.description: The name of the S3 bucket

force_destroy.description: Indicates all objects should be deleted from the bucket so that the bucket can be destroyed without error. These objects are not recoverable.

object_lock_enabled.description: Enable object locking for this bucket. Object lock allows you to store objects using a write once, read many (WORM) model.

tags.description: A mapping of AWS tags to assign to the bucket.
